text:
Caroline Kaart (born Caroline Paterson Raitt; 21 December 1931 – 15 September 2020) was a Scottish-Dutch opera singer and television presenter. Kaart was born in Edinburgh. She was a mezzo-soprano. In 1982, she was honored with Order of Orange-Nassau. For many years, she was the host of "Classic with Caroline".
Kaart died on 15 September 2020 at the age of 88.
